review: Doctor seemed Very humble and helpful , provide genuine suggestions , plus all the staff members are also quite helpful

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited for treatment of extreme tooth ache and to fill 2 gaps on the lower and upper jaw due to earlier extractions. To my amazement 5 Root Canal Treatment and one extraction of tooth was done in single go in less than 2 hours with a gap of 45 mts in between. The procedure was done with lots of care, absolute painless and 100% relief. Friendly educative advice and proper medicine for post treatment gave me a real different experience. My gratitude and hats off to Dr. Utkarsha Lokesh for an absolute satisfied treatment in all counts. His experience and expertise is highly laudable. Happy to recommend to my family and friends.
reply_text: Many thanks for kind words sir.this motivates our team further..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly..... I was always skeptical going to a Dentist... But after this Appointment, I had a good Feeling visiting a Dentist... I went for Dental cleaning but to my surprise I also had a cavity... He actually showed me the cavity on screen... Doctor Reba too did an excellent job in cleaning up as It had been years and there has been quite some yellow discoloration ... she too was explaining in detail for all the queries I had.... I have my next visit scheduled in couple of days for a Root canal... Hope to get it done smoothly as well... I would definitely recommend Dr. Utkarsha and his team for any dental problems....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Fractured Tooth,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Dr Utkarsh took me step by step with what my problem is, what the remedy is , what procedures need to be done and the side effects that may occur during the procedures, he called me a few hours later, went about the process exactly as he had explained, no alterations ( this was great as mostly doctors say something and do something else.) His ability to put a patient in reasonable ease and stick to a timeline before the process is great. I still have 2 more sittings of the RCT remaining, looking forward to having a smooth experience like today. The wisdom tooth extraction done today was flawless, keep it up Dr.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had broken my front tooth and got treated ** ******* ******* ******* ** ** ******** which resulted in it developing infection after a year.It was at this time that I decided to visit Dr utkarsh. He gave good explanation about the treatment *** *** ***** ***** ****** **** **** ** * ********* ******** Nonetheless, I chose to go ahead with tooth extraction and infection removal from him.The immediate end result of the treatment was fine but I developed an infection again post 7 months of the treatment because of which I was unable to get permanent implants. Very unsatisfied with this dentist *** *** **** ** **** ***** ** ********** ***** **** *** *** ********* ******** ** **** ***** *** ******* *** **** ******* ** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Most people are afraid of dental treatment especially when it it is first time. I approached Dr Utkarsha Lokesh with this apprehension and fear. But once I talked to doctor, I was sure of undergoing treatment at the earliest. I sat on dental chair with confidence. Went through double procedure of root canal treatment and wisdom tooth removal. Never had any problems. Fully normal within hours. The set up is hygienic. Approach is professional and doctor is expert. What more needed ?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I have undergone 4 wisdom teeth extraction & 1 root canal process, all in a single 2 hour sitting last week. Both the pre & post procedural experience has been beyond expectations thanks to the expertise of Dr Utkarsha & Dr. Nishant (root canal). I had a lot of apprehension about the pain & suffering from dental procedures based on my earlier experiences with other dentists & none of them remain now that I have had this experience.  Completely painless & smooth, Thank you Dr Utkarsha!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The best dental care center i have ever visited!. 
Met Dr. Utkarsh for my 9 year old daughter's treatment. He is very friendly, caring, Professional & courteous.
Even the staff was great. Very welcoming and friendly.
Everything was on time and it was an extremely professionally run office. 
A fantastic experience that is super easy for anyone. 
If you have any dental issues, surely this is the Place to visit.

Dr Utkarsha and is team are very comforting and professional. The procedure was also performed very skillfully with little to no discomfort in an otherwise feared tooth removal.  The clinic is very polished and clean with state of the art facilities. The doctor and staff explains in detail all the prognosis, treatment and possible side effects and does and don't.  I will highly recommend Dr Utkarsha and his team.

I visited Dr. Utkarsha's clinic for my wisdom tooth extraction. Dr. Utkarsh was very friendly and so was his staff, he explained me the procedure and the dos and don'ts to be followed. *** ********* *** ********* **** *********** ** *** ******* I am happy with his services.

review: little bit costly treatment compared with other dental clinics.  They refused to  hand over our file and even x-rays.   After long arguments we got our x-rays by email.   If we have any medical issues while we are in out of station  how can we know what treatments were given.   Their expectation is,  we have visit there every time, even we are in out of station.  There are so many dental clinics available in Bengaluru.   No one behave like this.   I never visit here again.
